channel.title: [PI] Animation Error when Starting client
channel.description:
Whenever i start my client and it gets to loading animation, i get this error.
[code]RS2 user client - release #317 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:65) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:1710) at client.startUp(client.java:7492) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4686) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: [PI] Animation Error when Starting client
item.dc:creator: @genoarch genoarch
item.description:
@genoarch wrote:

ok you need to do a check with the server ip in your client for that and your server if your using project insanity, cause i can sign i and everythign works im just afraid something will happen down the road, you know?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Animation Error when Starting client
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

I also need help, I get this error as well.

RS2 user client - release #317 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:65) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:1710) at client.startUp(client.java:7492) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4686) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Also, when i try and sign in it says “No response from server, please try using a different world”.
